response.explain: The previous action failed because the robot was not within a meter of the fridge. The fridge needs to be within a meter of the robot in order for it to interact with it. In order for the robot to get close to an object, it needs to run the MoveBot function.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take out the brisket from the fridge.
(4) Cook the brisket.
response.code:
def act(robot, env, camera):
    # Subtask 1: Move the robot to the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_dszchb_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, fridge, camera)
    donothing(env)
